paper_metadata.title: Clarifying the impact of livelihood interventions on the livelihood resilience of farmers in undeveloped mountain areas

program_information.program_name: Multiple livelihood interventions in Longnan mountain areas
program_information.region: Longnan mountain areas, Qinba mountain area

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: To analyze the impact of multiple livelihood interventions on livelihood resilience, we constructed an analytical framework and analyzed the enjoyment of livelihood interventions and the heterogeneity of livelihood resilience among out-of-poverty farmers
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: we studied the impact of intervention intensity on livelihood resilience through the multiple linear regression model

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: To analyze the impact of multiple livelihood interventions on livelihood resilience, we constructed an analytical framework and analyzed the enjoyment of livelihood interventions and the heterogeneity of livelihood resilience among out-of-poverty farmers in the Longnan mountain areas, China
evidence_citations.country_citation: We took Longnan mountain area located in the hinterland of the Qinba mountain area in China as a case study
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: analyzed the enjoyment of livelihood interventions and the heterogeneity of livelihood resilience among out-of-poverty farmers in the Longnan mountain areas
